diff --git a/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1190.json b/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1190.json
index cce32e4e7..461c065bf 100644
--- a/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1190.json
+++ b/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1190.json
@@ -10,12 +10,19 @@
   "created_at": "2018-11-15T10:51:23Z",
   "github_updated_at": "2021-09-13T19:21:22Z",
   "body_snippet": "mRemoteNG should support that we put the URI file to the private key directly in the conexions tab.\r\n\r\n\r\n## Expected Behavior\r\nmRemoteNG should support that we put the URI to the private key directly in the connections tab.\r\nIt's a very common and more secury authentication in Linux.\r\n\r\n## Current Behavior\r\n1. Create a new conexion\r\n2. Change name, protocol, and username\r\n3. Open putty, configure pointing to private key, save with the same name before\r\n4. Change session in mRemoteNG to the same ...",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P3-enhancement",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-17",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "Users must currently create a PuTTY session externally just to use an SSH private key; adding an SSHPrivateKeyPath property on the connection object would allow specifying the key file directly in mRemoteNG's connection settings."
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [
     {
       "id": "IC_kwDOAAcIMM42v0A5",
@@ -32,5 +39,5 @@
   "needs_action": true,
   "waiting_for_us": true,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (claude): Users must currently create a PuTTY session externally just to use an SSH private key; adding an SSHPrivateKeyPath property on the connection object would allow specifying the key file directly in mRemoteNG's connection settings.\nApproach: Add an SSHPrivateKeyPath string property to AbstractConnectionRecord (following SSHOptions/PuttySession pattern), wire it into ConnectionInfoInheritance, then in PuttyBase.Connect() pass '-i <path>' to PuTTY when the property is set, and update XML/CSV serializers."
 }
